definition: tissue from an animal of one species used as a temporary graft, as in cases of severe burns, on an individual of another species
details:
noun
- tissue from an animal of one species used as a temporary graft, as in cases of severe burns, on an individual of another species
= example: tissue from an animal of one species used as a temporary graft, as in cases of severe burns, on an individual of another species
= synonyms: heterograft
